name: EchoMobile
description: Real-time voice translation with AI-powered communication
author: Echo Team

infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone for audio recording and real-time translation.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera for video calls and visual features.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access for location-based features.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to save and share recordings.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Echo to access your microphone for audio recording and real-time translation.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Echo to access your camera for video calls and visual features.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Echo to use your location for location-based features.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Echo to access your photo library to save and share recordings.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Echo to save recordings to your photo library.
